column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Highly overrated and underwhelming. Subpar pancakes masked in a glaze of berries and other nonsense. Once you actually taste the pancakes
column2: they are not that great. Unless you want to feel like you're about to burst with sugar
column3: don't waste your time. And time you will waste
column4: as the average wait time is an hour and a half.
